data.message:
Marshall,   I saw her today at the reception...  A Glass of wine in her hand,  I knew she was going to meet her connection...with her glassed Stained hands,   You can't always gets what,  You can't can't alway get what you need   but you just might find you get want you need...,    I knew she was going to meet her connection..   At her foot was a foot loose man... 
No you don't always get what you what...
No you don't always get what you need if you find sometime...    You just might find,   You might just get what you need.   But you just might find you get what you need.
And I went down to the demonstration to get my fair share of abuse...  if you don't you are going to blow a fifty amp fuse.,.
God Bless.,   Bless Me as Well Too...    <3
